tika-abh08t45:2_2: Sikhāpatti panassā udayabbayañāṇādīnaṁ aṭṭhañāṇānaṁ vasenāti āha “aṭṭhañāṇavasenā”ti.
tika-abh08t45:3_1: Tāni pana ñāṇāni sarūpato dassetuṁ “aṭṭha ñāṇānī”tiādi vuttaṁ.
tika-abh08t45:3_3: tathāpi yathāvuttaṭṭhena paṭipadāñāṇadassanampi hotiyevāti tampi idha vuttaṁ.
tika-abh08t45:3_4: Itarattha pana uppannamattaṁ appaguṇaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ.
tika-abh08t45:3_6: Yato tadadhigamena aṭṭhārasasu mahāvipassanāsu ekaccā adhigatāva honti.
tika-abh08t45:3_7: Na hi udayabbayānaṁ paccakkhato paṭivedhena vinā sāmaññākārānaṁ tīraṇamattena sātisayaṁ paṭipakkhappahānaṁ sambhavati.
tika-abh08t45:3_8: Asati ca paṭipakkhappahāne kuto ñāṇādīnaṁ vajiramiva avihatavegatā tikhiṇavisadāditā vā,
tika-abh08t45:4_10: Nirapekkhatāya saṅkhārānaṁ upekkhanavasena pavattaṁ ñāṇaṁ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṁ.
tika-abh08t45:5_1: Nanu ca udayabbayañāṇassa pageva siddhattā kimatthaṁ puna tatthāpi abhiyogoti ce?
tika-abh08t45:5_3: Udayabbayañāṇañhi heṭṭhā dasahi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhaṁ hutvā yāthāvasarasato tilakkhaṇaṁ sallakkhetuṁ nāsakkhi,
tika-abh08t45:5_5: tasmā lakkhaṇasallakkhaṇatthaṁ puna tattheva yogo kātabbo.
tika-abh08t45:5_8: tasmā udayabbayaṁ manasi katvā santatiṁ ugghāṭetvā aniccalakkhaṇaṁ,
tika-abh08t45:5_10: dhātuyo vinibbhujitvā ghanavinibbhogaṁ katvā anattalakkhaṇañca sallakkhetvā “aniccā dukkhā anattā”ti saṅkhārā punappunaṁ sammasitabbā.
tika-abh08t45:5_11: Tassevaṁ tulayato tīrayato yadā saṅkhāragataṁ attano lahuupaṭṭhānena,
tika-abh08t45:5_12: ñāṇassa ca tikkhatāya tirohituppādādibhedaṁ bhijjamānameva upaṭṭhāti,
tika-abh08t45:5_14: tadā bhaṅgānupassanā nāma vipassanāñāṇaṁ adhigataṁ hoti.
tika-abh08t45:5_15: Tassa tadeva saṅkhāranirodhārammaṇabhaṅgānupassanaṁ āsevantassa yadā sabbabhavayonigatiṭṭhitinivāsesu
tika-abh08t45:5_16: saṅkhārā bhijjanasabhāvatāya yakkharakkhasādayo viya mahābhayaṁ hutvā upaṭṭhahanti,
tika-abh08t45:5_23: byasanāpannānaṁ pana sabbasaṅkhārānaṁ bhayato upaṭṭhitānaṁ gahaṇena bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇanti vuccatīti.
tika-abh08t45:6_0: Tassa taṁ bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṁ āsevantassa yadā sabbabhavagatesu saṅkhāresu tāṇaṁ vā leṇaṁ vā parāyaṇaṁ vā na paññāyati,
tika-abh08t45:6_1: ukkhittāsiko viya paccāmitto sādīnavā eva saṅkhārā upaṭṭhahanti,
tika-abh08t45:6_2: tassa saṅkhārānaṁ ādīnavameva passantassa ādīnavañāṇaṁ nāma uppannaṁ hoti.
tika-abh08t45:6_3: Tassevaṁ sabbasaṅkhāre ādīnavato passantassa yadā tibhavapariyāpannesu nibbedo uppajjati,
tika-abh08t45:6_6: tadāssa nibbidānupassanaṁ nāma ñāṇaṁ uppannaṁ hoti.
tika-abh08t45:6_7: Tassa yadā iminā nibbidāñāṇena sabbasaṅkhāresu nibbindantassa ekasaṅkhārepi cittaṁ na sajjati,
tika-abh08t45:6_8: sabbasmā saṅkhārato sappamukhagatassa viya maṇḍūkassa muccitukāmatā uppajjati,
tika-abh08t45:6_10: Tassevaṁ sabbasaṅkhārehi muccitukāmassa niccasukhasubhaattākārena pana upaṭṭhituṁ asamatthataṁ pāpetvā
tika-abh08t45:6_14: tucchatādīhi anattalakkhaṇañca āropetvā sabbasaṅkhāragataṁ pariggaṇhantassa paṭisaṅkhānupassanāñāṇaṁ nāma uppannaṁ hoti.
tika-abh08t45:6_15: Tena panevaṁ pariggahitasaṅkhārena yā sā “suññamidaṁ attena vā attaniyena vā”tiādinā dvikoṭikādibhedā suññatā vuttā,
tika-abh08t45:6_17: Tassevaṁ suññato disvā tilakkhaṇaṁ āropetvā sammasantassa yadā bhayañca nandiñca vippahāya vissaṭṭhabhariyassa
tika-abh08t45:6_21: Taṁ panetaṁ yāva nibbānaṁ na passati,
tika-abh08t45:6_22: tāva disākāko viya kūpakayaṭṭhiṁ punappunaṁ saṅkhārameva anabhimatampi nissāya saṅkhāravicinanepi majjhattameva hutvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-abh08t45:7_3: “Vuṭṭhāna”nti hi bahiddhā nimittabhūtā abhiniviṭṭhavatthuto ceva ajjhattappavattato ca vuṭṭhahanato maggo vuccati,
tika-abh08t45:8_0: 1307.Tanti yaṁ sikhāpattā vipassanā saccānulomañāṇanti ca vuccati,
tika-abh08t45:8_2: Āsevantassāti punappunaṁ sammasanavasena sevantassa bhāventassa bahulīkarontassa.
tika-abh08t45:8_3: Tassa hi adhimokkhasaddhā bhāvanāvasena balavatarā nibbattissati,
tika-abh08t45:8_7: tatova anulomañāṇuppattiyā paccayo bhavituṁ samatthā tikkhatamā saṅkhārupekkhā uppajjati.
tika-abh08t45:9_1: votarateva sāti aniccādīsu ekena ākārena sammasantī sattakkhattuṁ pavattitvā bhijjantī bhavaṅgaṁ otiṇṇā nāma hoti,
tika-abh08t45:9_7: Bhavaṅgāvaṭṭanaṁ katvāti bhavaṅgassa nivattanaṁ katvā cittassa bhavaṅgavasena pavattituṁ adatvā.
tika-abh08t45:10_3: “udayabbayavantānaṁyeva vata dhammānaṁ udayabbayañāṇaṁ uppādavaye addasā”ti ca “bhaṅgavantānaṁyeva vata
tika-abh08t45:10_4: bhaṅgānupassanaṁ bhaṅgamaddasā”ti ca “sabhayaṁyeva vata bhayatupaṭṭhānassa bhayato upaṭṭhita”nti ca “sādīnaveyeva
tika-abh08t45:10_5: vata ādīnavānupassanaṁ ādīnavamaddasā”ti ca “nibbinditabbeyeva vata nibbidāñāṇaṁ nibbinda”nti ca “muccitabbamhiyeva
tika-abh08t45:10_6: vata muccitukamyatāñāṇaṁ muccitukāmaṁ jāta”nti ca “paṭisaṅkhātabbameva vata paṭisaṅkhāñāṇena paṭisaṅkhāta”nti
tika-abh08t45:10_7: ca “upekkhitabbaṁyeva vata saṅkhārupekkhāya upekkhita”nti ca atthato vadamānaṁ viya imesañca aṭṭhannaṁ
tika-abh08t45:10_8: ñāṇānaṁ katakiccatāya anulometi sabbāsaṁyeva vipassanānaṁ lakkhaṇattayasammasanakiccattā,
tika-abh08t45:10_9: tathā upari ca ariyamagge sattatiṁsāya bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṁ tāya paṭipadāya pattabbatāya.
tika-abh08t45:10_10: Na hi anulomañāṇe thūlathūlasaccapaṭicchādakasaṁkilesavikkhambhanavasena appavattante gotrabhuñāṇaṁ uppajjati,
tika-abh08t45:10_11: gotrabhuñāṇe ca anuppanne maggañāṇaṁ na uppajjati,
tika-abh08t45:10_19: Asaṅkhatārammaṇaṁ pana sabbena sabbaṁ ariyamaggasaṅkhātaṁ vuṭṭhānaṁ gacchati upetīti.
tika-abh08t45:10_20: Tatopi hi visesato “vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā”ti vattabbataṁ labhatīti āha “ñeyyaṁ sabbappakārenā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t45:11_1: ariyamaggādhiṭṭhānatāya mahantānaṁ sīlakkhandhādīnaṁ esanato gavesanato mahesinā sammāsambuddhena.
